A '''potion of Leaping''' is a potion that provides [[Jump Boost]] when used.

== Obtaining ==
=== Brewing ===
{{Brewing
|head = 1
|Rabbit's Foot
|base = Awkward Potion
|Potion of Leaping
|showvariants=1
}}
{{Brewing
|Redstone Dust
|base = Potion of Leaping
|Potion of Leaping Extended
|name = Extended Potion of Leaping
|showvariants=1
}}
{{Brewing
|Glowstone Dust
|base = Potion of Leaping
|Potion of Leaping Enhanced
|name = Potion of Leaping II
|showvariants=1
}}
{{Brewing
|Gunpowder
|base2= Potion of Leaping
|base1= Potion of Leaping Extended
|base3= Potion of Leaping Enhanced
|Splash Potion of Leaping Extended
|Splash Potion of Leaping
|Splash Potion of Leaping Enhanced
|name = Splash Potion of Leaping
|ingredients = [[Gunpowder]] +<br> '''Potion of Leaping'''
}}
{{Brewing
|Dragon's Breath
|base2= Splash Potion of Leaping
|base1= Splash Potion of Leaping Extended
|base3= Splash Potion of Leaping Enhanced
|Lingering Potion of Leaping Extended
|Lingering Potion of Leaping
|Lingering Potion of Leaping Enhanced
|name = Lingering Potion of Leaping
|ingredients = [[Dragon's Breath]] +<br> '''Splash Potion of Leaping'''
|foot=1
}}

== Usage ==
=== Effect ===
{| class="wikitable"
! Potion type
! Tier
! Duration
! Effect
! Description
|-
| rowspan="2" |Potion
| 1
| Regular: 3:00 <br> Extended: 8:00
| rowspan="6" |{{EffectLink|Jump Boost}}
| Increases the jump height to 1.83 blocks and reduces fall damage by one block.
|-
| 2
| 1:30
| Further increases jump height to 2.51 blocks and reduces fall damage by two blocks.
|-
| rowspan="2" |Splash Potion
| 1
| Regular: 3:00 <br> Extended: 8:00
| Increases the jump height to 1.83 blocks and reduces fall damage by one block.
|-
| 2
| 1:30
| Further increases jump height to 2.51 blocks and reduces fall damage by two blocks.
|-
| rowspan="3" |Lingering Potion
| 1
| Regular: 0:45 <br> Extended: 3:00
| Increases the jump height to 1.83 blocks and reduces fall damage by one block.
|-
| 2
| 0:22
| Further increases jump height to 2.51 blocks and reduces fall damage by two blocks.
|}
{{:Calculators/Jump boost}}

=== Base potion ===
Potion of Leaping is a base for brewing [[potions of Slowness]].
{{Brewing
|head = 1
|Fermented Spider Eye
|base = Potion of Leaping
|Potion of Slowness
|showvariants=1
}}
{{Brewing
|Fermented Spider Eye
|base = Potion of Leaping Extended
|Potion of Slowness Extended
|name = Extended [[Potion of Slowness]]
|ingredients = [[Fermented Spider Eye]] +<br> '''Extended Potion of Leaping'''
|showvariants=1
|foot = 1
}}

=== Crafting ingredient ===
{{Crafting
|head = 1
|ignoreusage = 1
|showname = 1
|name = [[Arrow of Leaping]]
|ingredients = [[Arrow]] +<br>'''Lingering Potion of Leaping'''
|A1 = Arrow
|A2 = Arrow
|A3 = Arrow
|B1 = Arrow
|B2 = Lingering Potion of Leaping; Lingering Potion of Leaping Enhanced; Lingering Potion of Leaping Extended
|B3 = Arrow
|C1 = Arrow
|C2 = Arrow
|C3 = Arrow
|Output = Arrow of Leaping, 8; Arrow of Leaping Enhanced, 8; Arrow of Leaping Extended, 8
|foot = 1
}}
